statements: SELECT * FROM transportation_fuel_consumption;
SELECT vehicle_name, fuel_consumed FROM transportation_fuel_consumption WHERE fuel_consumed > 100;
SELECT travel_distance, fuel_type FROM transportation_fuel_consumption WHERE vehicle_id = 5;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_name, fuel_type FROM transportation_fuel_consumption ORDER BY fuel_consumed DESC;
SELECT * FROM transportation_fuel_consumption WHERE fuel_type = 'Diesel';
SELECT vehicle_name, travel_distance FROM transportation_fuel_consumption WHERE fuel_type='Gasoline'
SELECT * FROM transportation_fuel_consumption ORDER BY fuel_consumed DESC, travel_distance ASC
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT vehicle_id) AS total_vehicles FROM transportation_fuel_consumption WHERE fuel_type='Diesel'
SELECT SUM(fuel_consumed) AS total_fuel_consumed, AVG(travel_distance) AS avg_distance FROM transportation_fuel_consumption GROUP BY fuel_type HAVING total_fuel_consumed > 500
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_name, fuel_consumed, travel_distance FROM transportation_fuel_consumption WHERE travel_distance > 1000 ORDER BY vehicle_name ASC
SELECT * FROM transportation_modes;
SELECT mode_name, fuel_type FROM transportation_modes ORDER BY mode_name DESC;
SELECT mode_id, SUM(fuel_consumed) AS total_fuel_consumed FROM fuel_consumption GROUP BY mode_id;
SELECT mode_name, fuel_consumed, date FROM fuel_consumption WHERE fuel_consumed > 100;
SELECT mode_name, fuel_type FROM transportation_modes WHERE mode_name LIKE 'Car%';
SELECT * FROM transportation_modes ORDER BY mode_name DESC;
SELECT mode_name, fuel_type FROM transportation_modes WHERE fuel_type='Electric';
SELECT t.mode_name, f.date, f.fuel_consumed FROM transportation_modes t INNER JOIN fuel_consumption f ON t.mode_id = f.mode_id;
SELECT mode_name, SUM(fuel_consumed) AS total_fuel_consumed FROM transportation_modes t INNER JOIN fuel_consumption f ON t.mode_id = f.mode_id GROUP BY mode_name;
SELECT mode_name, AVG(fuel_consumed) AS avg_fuel_consumed FROM transportation_modes t INNER JOIN fuel_consumption f ON t.mode_id = f.mode_id GROUP BY mode_name HAVING AVG(fuel_consumed) > 50;
SELECT * FROM transportation_modes;
SELECT mode_name, fuel_type FROM transportation_modes WHERE mode_id = 1;
SELECT DISTINCT fuel_type FROM transportation_modes ORDER BY mode_name DESC;
SELECT mode_id, mode_name, fuel_type FROM transportation_modes WHERE fuel_type = 'Electric';
SELECT trend_date, fuel_type, SUM(fuel_consumed) AS total_fuel_consumed FROM energy_usage_trends GROUP BY trend_date;
SELECT * FROM transportation_modes;
SELECT mode_name, fuel_type FROM transportation_modes WHERE mode_id = 1;
SELECT MAX(fuel_amount) AS max_fuel_amount, MIN(fuel_amount) AS min_fuel_amount FROM fuel_consumption;
SELECT trend_date, fuel_type, SUM(fuel_consumed) AS total_fuel_consumed FROM energy_usage_trends GROUP BY trend_date, fuel_type;
SELECT * FROM transportation_modes JOIN fuel_consumption ON transportation_modes.mode_id = fuel_consumption.mode_id;
SELECT * FROM vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_name, fuel_type FROM vehicles WHERE fuel_type='Diesel';
SELECT vehicle_name, fuel_capacity FROM vehicles ORDER BY fuel_capacity DESC;
SELECT mode_name, emission_factor FROM transportation_modes WHERE emission_factor > 0.5;
SELECT vehicle_id, fuel_quantity, fill_date FROM fuel_records WHERE vehicle_id=3;
SELECT * FROM vehicles ORDER BY vehicle_name DESC, fuel_capacity ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT fuel_records.vehicle_id, vehicles.vehicle_name, fuel_quantity, fuel_cost FROM fuel_records INNER JOIN vehicles ON fuel_records.vehicle_id = vehicles.vehicle_id WHERE fuel_quantity > 100 ORDER BY fuel_quantity DESC;

SELECT analysis_id, record_id, mode_name, energy_usage FROM energy_analysis INNER JOIN transportation_modes ON energy_analysis.mode_id = transportation_modes.mode_id ORDER BY analysis_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE fuel_type = 'Diesel' OR fuel_capacity >= 30 ORDER BY vehicle_id ASC;

SELECT fuel_records.record_id, fill_date, fuel_quantity, fuel_cost FROM fuel_records INNER JOIN vehicles ON fuel_records.vehicle_id = vehicles.vehicle_id WHERE vehicle_name LIKE '%car%' ORDER BY fill_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM fuel_consumption ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT fuel_type, fuel_amount FROM fuel_consumption WHERE distance_traveled > 100 ORDER BY fuel_amount DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT vehicle_name, manufacturer, model, year FROM vehicle WHERE manufacturer = 'Toyota' ORDER BY year LIMIT 5

SELECT vehicle_name, mode_name FROM vehicle JOIN vehicle_mode_mapping ON vehicle.vehicle_id = vehicle_mode_mapping.vehicle_id JOIN transportation_mode ON vehicle_mode_mapping.mode_id = transportation_mode.mode_id ORDER BY vehicle_name LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM fuel_type ORDER BY fuel_type_name
SELECT * FROM fuel_consumption ORDER BY date DESC, fuel_amount ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT vehicle_name, year FROM vehicle WHERE manufacturer = 'Toyota';
SELECT fuel_type_name, AVG(fuel_amount) AS average_fuel_amount FROM fuel_consumption GROUP BY fuel_type_name;
SELECT vehicle_name, manufacturer, model, year FROM vehicle WHERE year BETWEEN 2010 AND 2020 ORDER BY model ASC;
SELECT v.vehicle_name, m.mode_name FROM vehicle_mode_mapping vm JOIN vehicle v ON vm.vehicle_id = v.vehicle_id JOIN transportation_mode m ON vm.mode_id = m.mode_id WHERE v.manufacturer = 'Honda';
